name: STYX LIFESCIENCES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Art on Subscription: 

Through our flagship service, we want to help people explore as much art as they want without the burden of big investments and ownership. For a small monthly subscription (starting Rs. 90/month), subscribers can bring home the artwork they love and also get to refresh it every six months – for free. That means the freedom to explore and experience multiple artworks - be it paintings, digital art, photographs or mixed media pieces - for a fraction of the cost of owning one.


Buy | Subscribe Now Buy Later (launching Jan 2019):

On the back of a mostly exclusive inventory, well-appreciated curation and multiple queries, we have decided to offer consumers the option to buy artworks outright right from the website. Closing the loop, subscribers will now also have the option to buy their existing artwork at any point for a special rate.  

Additional services:

We are also actively involved in projects involving:
I. murals
II. installations 
III. art-based events and exhibitions

Apart from helping us leverage our existing client and artist base, these also align with our vision of bringing more art to the public in various ways and forms.

Floating Canvas Company
